teammembers.name: Agnes
teammembers.title: Vice President of Accounting
teammembers.bio: With over 14 years of public accounting and business advisory service experience in the Tongas, Ecuador, Canada, Botswana and the US, Agnes is the most seasoned and diversed member of the Vecta Corp. team.

teammembers.name: Damon
teammembers.title: Director of Development
teammembers.bio: Damon is the Director of Development for Vecta Corp. Damon creates learning materials for Vecta Corp. as well as consulting for customers to integrate vSolutions into their production pipeline and business processes.

teammembers.name: Herbert
teammembers.title: Director of Human Resources
teammembers.bio: Herbert joined Vecta Corp. in October 1999 as Vecta Corp's first Human Resources Director. As such, he has overall human resources responsibility for Vecta Corp's operations worldwide.

teammembers.name: Mike
teammembers.title: Vice President of Sales and Marketing
teammembers.bio: Mike serves as the Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Vecta Corp. In this role Mike oversees Vecta Corp's marketing and corporate communications efforts worldwide.

teammembers.name: Wilbur
teammembers.title: Founder and CEO
teammembers.bio: While Wilbur is the founder and CEO of Vecta Corp, he is primarily known for being the pioneer and world leader of creating vSolutions.
